title: HQ Checkpoint Schema
description: Canonical checkpoint format for HQ task progress tracking

task_id.description: Unique identifier for the task (e.g., US-001, feature-name)

completed_at.description: ISO8601 timestamp when checkpoint was created

files_touched.description: List of files modified during this work

build_passed.description: Whether build/tests passed after this work

commit.description: Git commit hash if code was committed

next_steps.description: Suggested next actions for future sessions
